alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; North Oregon Coast; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 05 at 2:27PM PST until January 07 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THURSDAY THROUGH FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt remains possible. * WHERE...Southwest Washington and northwest Oregon. * WHEN...Thursday through Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of larger rivers and streams. Thus, the flood watch. Note, a flood advisory remains in effect for much of the region for minor flooding of small streams and creeks, as well as areas of poor drainage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain, combined with snow melt from lower slopes of the Cascades, as well as snow melt from the Willapa Hills and Coast Range. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
